::KitKat::

She really didn't like doing that to Drillbit. But Phobia made 
sence.  She didn't want anything to comprimise her situation. She 
nodded,"I will do as you suggest reluctantly. But you are right. My 
love for him could be used against me and my position comprimised.  
yes, I will give you command over Drillbit. But be aware that I will 
override any command that will needlessly put his or anyone's lives 
in danger.  War and taking nessassary risks is one thing, but just to 
throw them into a metal cruncher is another." She looked at Phobia 
with a solom look. "I want to fight this war and win with minimal 
losses. We've had too many already."



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> "We can't rely on the other predacon groups, they won't act unless 
we 
> provide proof that he can be hurt" Phobia glanced around at thier 
> surroundings. "Shall we go?" he said, extending his arm in a mock 
> galant gesture."One more thing, before we get into battle I request 
> you give command over DrillBit directly to me, your realationship 
can 
> be looked on as a disadvantage that we can't afford."
> 
> with that he started walking toward the forner Predacon cave.
>
